name: UIReferenceLibraryViewController
desc: A view controller that displays a standard interface for looking up the definition of a word or term.

items.name: class func dictionaryHasDefinition(forTerm: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a definition is available for the given term.

items.name: init(term: String)
items.desc: Initializes a newly created reference-library view controller to display the definition of the given term.
